Texts.Eng: Find the source of the ^green;Welcoming Beacon^reset;.
Welcome back to the ^orange;Protectorate^reset;, Agent. With your help I know we can triumph. I've had one of our mechanics ^green;repair your FTL Drive^reset; so that you can resume your duties!

Welcome back to the ^orange;Protectorate^reset;, Agent. With your help I know we can triumph. We can't fix your ^red;broken FTL drive^reset; here! You'll have to ^green;build it on your own^reset;. Take this ^green;warp manifold^reset;! With it you can finish ^green;building your FTL drive^reset; at a ^orange;Machining Table^reset;.
